data.author: Matt C

changelog.release_notes:
- Added ability to change score colours
- Changed select button icon to play/pause symbol
- Prevented timer from counting down below zero
- Warn user (with a vibration) if they attempt to start the timer when there is no time left on the clock
- Better handling of persistent storage of configuration items (countdown timer, colours etc.)

data.description:
Keep score for a two-team (or two-competitor) match. Also includes countdown timer.

A short press of the 'up' button increases the left player's score and a long press decreases the score. The 'down' button does the same for the right player's score. Use the central 'select' button to start and stop the timer, and a long press resets both the timer and the scores.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added ability to change score colours
- Changed select button icon to play/pause symbol
- Prevented timer from counting down below zero
- Warn user (with a vibration) if they attempt to start the timer when there is no time left on the clock
- Better handling of persistent storage of configuration items (countdown timer, colours etc.)

data.title: Scorekeeper
